title: Farmer Dark Skin Tone
description: A person with dark skin tone working as a farmer, often depicted with a straw hat and holding a pitchfork or surrounded by crops. Represents agricultural work, rural life, and dedication to the land.
apple_vendor_description: The farmer emoji with a dark skin tone, as rendered on Apple devices, presents a dignified and hardworking individual, complete with realistic lighting that accentuates the texture of their clothing and hat. Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges give the figure a friendly, approachable feel, suggesting a connection to the earth and the fruits of labor. This emoji embodies agricultural pursuits, dedication, and the simple joys of cultivation, adding a grounded and authentic presence to digital communications on Apple devices.
